body:
@adg  barring secret agreements with the GFW administrators, the fact that a patch doesn't make any sense should at least mean comments explaining the changes should be added......

I understand you don't want the comments here to become something like youtube, but FWIW it gets on a lot of Hong Kong people's nerves to treat "HK" as Yet Another Chinese City... and of course, this patch raises the usual censorship, discrimination issues. I've refrained from commenting on those fronts before there's more information on the motivation of the patch, but I just wanted to make it clear that the patch doesn't make sense per se and sorely needs a bit of explanatory comments.
